questions: How do you prioritize features when everything seems important?
Tell me about a product you've successfully launched.
How do you gather and incorporate user feedback?
What metrics do you use to measure product success?
How do you work with engineering teams?
behavioral_questions: Tell me about a time when you had to say no to a stakeholder request.
Describe a product decision that didn't go as planned. What did you learn?
Give an example of how you've used data to drive a product decision.
Tell me about a time you had to manage conflicting priorities.
